page.title: 01Steeple Barton,Steeple Aston
page.content: The area is divided by the A423 road into two parts which are within separate ecclesiastical and civil parishes. The larger western part is mainly open country. It is described throughout as Steeple Barton although as well as containing the hamlet of Steeple Barton it also includes the outskirts of the village of Middle Barton. The population of 70 approx. looks for facilities to Middle Barton. The eastern part, population 1000 approx., contains the hamlet of Middle Aston and the village of Steeple Aston which has many facilities.
